Richard Ferber bụ dọkịta na onye nduzi nke Ebe a na-ahụ maka nsogbu ihi ụra ụmụaka,, na Children's Hospital Boston
Ọ nọwo na-eme nchọpụta banyere nsogbu ụra na nsogbu ụra n'ime ụmụaka ihe karịrị afọ 30

A maara ya nke ọma maka usoro ya - nke a na-akpọkarị ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge gara maka nsogbụ ndị Ferberization - nke na-ezube ịkụziri ụmụ ọhụrụ otú ha ga-esi na-ehi ụra n'onwe ha, nke akọwapụtara n'akwụkwọ ya Solve Your Child's Sleep Problems (mbipụta mbụ 1985).
